meanings.definition: To extend beyond a safe or reasonable limit.
meanings.sent1: She kept overextending her reach to grab the toy on the high shelf.
meanings.sent2: The athlete risked injury by overextending during the race.
meanings.sent3: The tree branch groaned as if overextending to touch the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like a rubber band, always overextending before snapping.
meanings.sent5: The river overextending its banks flooded the nearby fields.

meanings.definition: To stretch or strain beyond normal capacity.
meanings.sent1: He was overextending his muscles trying to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The fabric tore from overextending it while trying to fit into the dress.
meanings.sent3: The balloon looked comical, as if overextending to stay afloat.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded strained, as if overextending to reach the high notes.
meanings.sent5: The elastic band was overextending, ready to snap at any moment.
